name: ICU
description: A separate area in a medical facility, equipped with high-tech facilities for close monitoring.

name: ENT
description: ENTs deal with anything that has to do with the head, neck, and ears in all the patients either adults or children.

name: vaccinations
description: Vaccination is the administration of a vaccine to help the immune system develop immunity from a disease.

name: Medical Dressage
description: The objective of dressing wounds is to promote healing. The procedure includes cleaning, disinfection and protection of the wound while respecting the rules of hygiene.

name: Laboratory
description: healthcare facilities providing a wide range of laboratory procedures which aid the physicians in carrying out the diagnosis, treatment, and management of patients.

name: Rehabilitation services
description: services that help a person regain physical, mental, and/or cognitive abilities that have been lost or impaired as a result of disease, injury, or treatment.

name: Home nursing services
description: Nurses provide multidimensional care to patients of all ages. Home health care is a cost efficient way to deliver quality care in client's home.

name: surgical services
description: professional services necessarily and directly performed by a Physician in the treatment of an Injury or illness requiring surgical procedures.

name: Mental health care
description: services devoted to the treatment of mental illnesses and the improvement of mental health in people with mental disorders or problems
